message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am offering the product to you for $12000. This price reflects its high value and your appreciation for it, while ensuring a fair profit for me. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I would like to propose a price of $10500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of your offer, I would like to suggest a compromise. How about we aim for a price of $11000 for the product? This still allows for a reasonable profit while being more accessible to your budget. I look forward to your thoughts on this proposal.
